string-array.name: encfs_method_desc
string-array.item: AES 256, filename block encoding with IV chaining, per-file IV, external IV chaining, MAC block headers
AES 192, filename block encoding with IV chaining, per-file IV, no external IV chaining, no MAC block headers
AES 256, filename stream encoding without IV chaining, no per-file IV, no external IV chaining, no MAC block headers
Blowfish 128, filename stream encoding without IV chaining, no per-file IV, no external IV chaining, no MAC block headers
